casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Edward BUTLER 629P01-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 John Edward Butler, for Butler, John Edward. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of February 2018 by Defendant to Locate and Preserve Evidence:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
